Posts.Content: Amoconn wrote: Sorry gemciabine. Ididn't respond to neoadjuvant chemo so am now having to do four cycles of this combo. Any stage 3 members completed this regimen Dx 7/21/2016, LCIS/DCIS/ILC/IDC, Left, 5cm, Stage IIIC, Grade 2, 14/17 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2- Chemotherapy 9/8/2016 AC + T (Taxol) Surgery 2/15/2017 Lymph node removal: Underarm/Axillary; Mastectomy: Left; Prophylactic mastectomy: Right; Prophylactic ovary removal Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Gemzar/Carboplatin? Amoconn 7of9
